mapper.select: SELECT a.userId, a.opId, a.ownerPhone, a.acreage, b.id, b.choice, b.create_time AS createTime, a.ownerName FROM ( SELECT sum(a.acreage) AS acreage, b.NAME AS ownerName, b.id AS userId, c.id AS opId, b.phone AS ownerPhone FROM o_owner_org a, o_owner b, o_op_info c WHERE a.user_id = b.id AND c.id = #{opId} AND a.org_id IN ( SELECT id FROM o_org WHERE id = c.org_id OR p_id = c.org_id ) GROUP BY a.user_id ) a LEFT JOIN o_reg_record b ON b.op_id = a.opId WHERE a.userId = b.user_id

SELECT count(if(a.choice = '同意', 1, NULL)) AS agreenUserCount, count(if(a.choice = '反对', 1, NULL)) AS rejectUserCount, count(if(a.choice = '弃权', 1, NULL)) AS giveUpUserCount, count(id) AS userCount FROM o_reg_record a WHERE a.op_id = #{opId}
